body.p:
John Ferrell -- Manslaughter
10 years -- June term Fulton ct ct 1858 -- Please Send this man a pardon -- He is very deserving --

James Pettit -- Killing his wife
5 years -- Jany term 1864 Jefferson ct ct -- A petition is on file for this man -- Gov Jacobs in your absence promised his friends to pardon him if I gave him a good character -- He has been well behaved --

Jefferson Cir Ct
vs
Jas Pettitt
Fulton Cir Ct
vs
John Ferrell
Pardoned 3d Oct /65
